quote: She already felt dead in everything but name. What remained to be taken from her? She longed to be enfolded, welcomed, into the earth - to breathe no more, love no more, hurt no more
quote_letters: SHE ALREADY FELT DEAD IN EVERYTHING BUT NAME WHAT REMAINED TO BE TAKEN FROM HER SHE LONGED TO BE ENFOLDED WELCOMED INTO THE EARTH - TO BREATHE NO MORE LOVE NO MORE HURT NO MORE
